title: South Africa : digital population as of January 2020
summary: This statistic shows the users Number of Digital Population in the South Africa ( ) between and 2020 .
Active_internet_users and Active_internet_users held the largest Number of the Digital users at 36.54 millions , following 2020 Active_mobile_internet_users with a 34.93 millions Number .
gold: This statistic presents the digital population in South Africa as of January 2020 . During this period of time , it was found that South Africa had 36.54 million internet users , of which 34.93 million were mobile internet users .
